verses.name: Numbers 34:4
verses.text: And your border shall turn from the south to the ascent of Akrabbim, and pass on to Zin: and the going forth thereof shall be from the south to Kadesh–barnea, and shall go on to Hazar–addar, and pass on to Azmon:

verses.name: Numbers 34:5
verses.text: And the border shall fetch a compass from Azmon unto the river of Egypt, and the goings out of it shall be at the sea.

verses.name: Numbers 34:6
verses.text: And as for the western border, ye shall even have the great sea for a border: this shall be your west border.
